title: Tradition

articles.content:
The “neo-conservatives” are now trying to tell us that America was the product
of “faith in revealed truths” and of uncritical respect for the traditions of
the past (!).
articles.attribution:
“Conservatism: An Obituary,”
Capitalism: The Unknown Ideal, 198

articles.content:
America was created by men who broke with all political traditions and who
originated a system unprecedented in history, relying on nothing but the
“unaided” power of their own intellect.
articles.attribution:
“Conservatism: An Obituary,”
Capitalism: The Unknown Ideal, 198

acknowledgement:
